#summary New Graph Classes
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===

About the new graph classes.

=== Class Tree ===

  * `basegraph` (a digraph with just the most simple operations)
    * `graph` (an ordinary pure-python-without-deps graph class based on basegraph)
    * `digraph` (an ordinary pure-python graph-without-deps class based on basegraph)
    * `numgraph` (a graph using numpy as backend and based on basegraph)
    * `numdigraph` (a graph using numpy as backend and based on basegraph)

=== basegraph ===

Methods for the `basegraph` class.
